registers.name: Total apparent power
registers.note: Valid for inverters: SG5KTL-MT SG6KTL-MT SG8KTL-M SG10KTL-M SG10KTL-MT SG12KTL-M SG15KTL-M SG17KTL-M SG20KTL-M RT Series SG33K3J SG36KTL-M SG40KTL-M SG50KTL SG50KTL-M SG60KTL SG60KTL-M SG60KU-M SG80KTL SG80KTL-M SG111HV SG125HV SG125HV-20 SG33CX SG40CX SG50CX SG110CX SG30CX SG36CX-US SG60CX-US SG49.5CX-JP SG25CX-SA SG100CX SG75CX SG225-350HX SG320HX-20 SG125CX-P2 SG110CX-P2 SG75CX- P2SG25/30/33/36/40/50CX-P2 SG150CX SG3.0/4.0/5.0/6.0/8.0/9.0/10RS-L SG15/20/25CX-P2-LV

registers.name: A-B line voltage/phase A voltage
registers.note: Output type (address: 5002) is 1: upload phase voltage; 2: upload line voltage Except SG5.5RS-JP

registers.name: B-C line Voltage/phase B Voltage
registers.note: Output type (address: 5002) is 1: upload phase voltage; 2: upload line voltage Except SG5.5RS-JP

registers.name: C-A line Voltage/phase C Voltage
registers.note: Output type (address: 5002) is 1: upload phase voltage; 2: upload line voltage Except SG5.5RS-JP

registers.name: Work state Fault/Alarm time: Year Fault/Alarm time: Month Fault/Alarm time: Day Fault/Alarm time: Hour Fault/Alarm time: Minute Fault/Alarm time: Second Fault/Alarm code 1 Reserved
registers.note: Data of address 5039 - 5045 are additional Fault/Alarm time and Fault/Alarm code (5039 - 5045) are valid only when the device work state is fault (0x5500) or alarm (0x9100). Except SG5.5RS-JP , SG0.7/1.0/1/5/2.0/2.5/3.0RS-S, SG3.0/3.6/4.0/5.0/6.0RS, SG5.0RS- ADA, SG8.0/9.0/10RS

registers.name: Meter power
registers.note: Valid for inverters: SG5KTL-MT SG6KTL-MT SG8KTL-M SG10KTL-M SG10KTL-MT SG12KTL-M SG15KTL-M SG17KTL-M SG20KTL-M Note: Country set to Europe Area.

registers.name: Work status1
registers.data_range: 0 : standby 1 : running 2 : Derating 3 : quota 4 : scheduled outage 5 : limit outage 6 : error outage
registers.note: Xinjiang power grid requirements Valid for inverters: SG5-25KTL_M SG125HV SG33-50CX SG100-136TX SG80—110HV-M SG225-350HX SG320HX-20 SG85BF SG80KTL-M RT Series

registers.name: Work status2
registers.note: Valid for inverters: SG5-25KTL_M SG125HV SG33-50CX SG100-136TX SG80—110HV-M SG225-350HX SG320HX-20 SG85BF SG80KTL-M RT Series SG3.0/4.0/5.0/6.0/8.0/9.0/10RS- L

registers.name: Total power yields
registers.note: (Display accuracy increased to 0.1kWh) Valid for inverters: SG5KTL-MT SG6KTL-MT SG8KTL-M SG10KTL-M SG10KTL-MT SG12KTL-M SG15KTL-M SG17KTL-M SG20KTL-M RT Series SG80KTL-M SG111HV SG125HV SG125HV-20 SG33CX SG40CX SG50CX SG110CX SG30CX SG36CX-US SG60CX-US SG49.5CX-JP SG25CX-SA SG100CX SG75CX SG225-350HX SG320HX-20 SG125CX-P2 SG110CX-P2 SG75CX-P2 SG25/30/33/36/40/50CX-P2 SG150CX SG3.0/4.0/5.0/6.0/8.0/9.0/10RS-L SG15/20/25CX-P2-LV

registers.name: Grid frequency
registers.note: (Display accuracy increased to 0.01Hz) Valid for inverters: SG5KTL-MT SG6KTL-MT SG8KTL-M SG10KTL-M SG10KTL-MT SG12KTL-M SG15KTL-M SG17KTL-M SG20KTL-M RT Series SG80KTL-M SG111HV SG125HV SG125HV-20 SG33CX SG40CX SG50CX SG110CX SG30CX SG36CX-US SG60CX-US SG49.5CX-JP SG25CX-SA SG100CX SG75CX SG225-320HX SG125CX-P2 SG110CX-P2 SG75CX-P2 SG25/30/33/36/40/50CX-P2 SG150CX SG3.0/4.0/5.0/6.0/8.0/9.0/10RS-L SG15/20/25CX-P2-LV

registers.name: PID work state
registers.data_range: 2: PID Recover Operation 4: Anti-PID Operation 8: PID Abnormity
registers.note: Valid for inverters: SG5KTL-MT SG6KTL-MT SG8KTL-M SG10KTL-M SG10KTL-MT SG12KTL-M SG15KTL-M SG17KTL-M SG20KTL-M RT Series SG80KTL-M SG125HV SG125HV-20 SG80KTL SG30CX SG33CX SG40CX SG50CX SG110CX SG100CX SG75CX SG136TX SG36CX-US SG60CX-US SG49.5CX-JP SG25CX-SA SG225-320HX SG125CX-P2 SG110CX-P2 SG75CX-P2 SG25/30/33/36/40/50CX-P2 SG150CX SG0.7RS-S SG1.0RS-S SG1.5RS-S SG2.0RS-S SG2.5RS-S SG3.0RS-S SG3.0RS SG3.6RS SG4.0RS SG5.0RS SG6.0RS SG8.0RS SG9.0RS SG10RS SG5.0RS-ADA SG3.0/4.0/5.0/6.0/8.0/9.0/10RS-L

registers.name: PID alarm code
registers.data_range: 432:PID resistance abnormal 433:PID function abnormal 434:PID overvoltage/overcurrent protection

registers.name: Certification version number of ARM software
Certification version number of DSP software
Daily Output Energy
registers.note: Power generation of active output (including PV power generation and battery discharge)

registers.name: Total Output Energy
registers.note: Power generation of active output (including PV power generation and battery discharge)

registers.name: A-B line voltage/phase A voltage
registers.note: Refer to Output type (address: 5002) 0: phase voltage; 1: phase voltage; 2: line voltage

registers.name: B-C line voltage/phase B voltage
registers.note: Refer to Output type (address: 5002) 0: phase voltage; 1: phase voltage; 2: line voltage

registers.name: C-A line voltage/phase voltage
registers.note: Refer to Output type (address: 5002) 0: phase voltage; 1: phase voltage; 2: line voltage

registers.name: Direct power consumption of today from PV
Daily direct energy consumption from PV
Monthly direct energy consumption from PV
Yearly direct energy consumption from PV
Daily battery charge energy from PV
Monthly battery charge energy from PV
Yearly battery charge energy from PV
Daily PV Generation
registers.note: Electricity generated by the inverter through the PV module on the day

registers.name: Total PV Generation
registers.note: Total electricity generated by the inverter through the PV module

registers.name: Daily export power from PV
registers.note: Electricity delivered by the inverter to power grid through the PV module on the day

registers.name: Total export energy from PV
registers.note: Total electricity delivered by the inverter to power grid through the PV module

registers.name: Export power
registers.note: Power delivered by the inverter to power grid

registers.name: Daily battery charge energy from PV
registers.note: Electricity that the inverter charges the batteries through the PV module on the day

registers.name: Total battery charge energy from PV
registers.note: Total electricity that the inverter charges the batteries through the PV module

registers.name: Daily direct energy consumption
registers.note: Electricity taken from PV module by loads on the day

registers.name: Total direct energy consumption
registers.note: Accumulated electricity taken by the inverter from the PV module

registers.name: Phase A current
registers.note: Output type (address 5002) is 0: only phase A current is uploaded; 1 or 2: current of corresponding phases is uploaded

registers.name: Battery Capacity
registers.note: Li-ion:0.1kWh; Lead-acid: 1Ah Applicable types: SH5.0-10.0RT SH8.0-10RS

registers.name: Daily export energy
registers.note: Electricity delivered by the inverter to power grid through the PV module or batteries on the day

registers.name: Total export energy
registers.note: Accumulated electricity delivered by the inverter to power grid through the PV module or batteries

registers.name: BMS protection
registers.note: This part of data is the fault alarm information of the batteries used for the inverter. The communication address is the communication address of the if 5 batteries are connected, the communication

registers.name: BMS fault 1
registers.note: This part of data is the fault alarm information of the batteries used for the inverter. The communication address is the communication address of the if 5 batteries are connected, the communication

registers.name: BMS fault 2
registers.note: This part of data is the fault alarm information of the batteries used for the inverter. The communication address is the communication address of the if 5 batteries are connected, the communication

registers.name: BMS alarm 2
registers.note: This part of data is the fault alarm information of the batteries used for the inverter. The communication address is the communication address of the if 5 batteries are connected, the communication
